blueprint.label: Construction Site
blueprint.description:
To use:
- Place and fully build this on a block.
- Disable personal construction bots.
- Place the block blueprint over-top. (Two lamps turn green.)
- Find the construction train and add this train-stop to the end with conditions:
    - Inactivity 1s
    - Time Elapsed  (optional)
- Turn on construction (the other const combinator between two lamps).

The lamps indicate what it's doing:
- cyan = waiting for material
- yellow = building
- blue = recycling
- green = done
- red = turned off/error

entities.name: arithmetic-combinator
entities.player_description: Isolate the "extra request" signal and make it available on both red & green.

entities.name: arithmetic-combinator
entities.player_description:
The outstanding _phase_ BOM request (possibly negative).
This is used for reporting and also to filter unloading of the train.

entities.name: arithmetic-combinator
entities.player_description: The outstanding _total_ BOM request (possibly negative).

entities.name: arithmetic-combinator
entities.player_description: How much "construction extras" to request.

entities.name: constant-combinator
entities.player_description: Don't latch these signals.

entities.name: constant-combinator
entities.player_description: ON SWITCH

entities.name: constant-combinator
entities.player_description: Additional items from mods can be added to the "Construction1" section and be remembered so long as at least one Construction Site exists in the game.

entities.name: constant-combinator
entities.player_description: Additional items from mods can be added to the "Construction2" section and be remembered so long as at least one Construction Site exists in the game.

entities.name: constant-combinator
entities.player_description: Additional items from mods can be added to the "Construction3" section and be remembered so long as at least one Construction Site exists in the game.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: Check if + has been held for a number of seconds.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: Hold and count S while notRESET and ADVANCE.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: Isolate Second ticker.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: Done when recycling and all items return.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: Filter items that are both in train inventory and in the current _phase_ request and use that to set filters on the extraction inserters.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: Have all the items for the current phase been received?

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: The amount of all items required for construction of the currentt phase, reduced by what has already been delivered.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: The total amount of all items required for complete construction (i.e. all phases), reduced by what has already been delivered.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description:
The _phase_ delivery request:
- Outstanding BOM.
- Standard items.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description:
The _total_ delivery request:
- Outstanding BOM across all phases.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: Latch to keep a total of everything that has been unloaded.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description:
Unloaded items for which there is no place in the logistics chests.
Disable stop in this case.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description:
Pulses for every unloaded item.
Drives that onto the grid-red for accounting.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: Only positive values.
